relevant_findings.description: Secret classified document discussing potential informant issues at a university
relevant_findings.direct_quote: HAD REFUSED TO SERVE AS INFORMANT FOR GOES ON SECURITY GROUNDS; CITED CASE OF STUDENT WHOSE REPUTATION RUINED IN UNIV
relevant_findings.significance: Suggests internal agency discussions about recruitment and potential personnel challenges

relevant_findings.description: Reference to Russian professors and a decision to 'let the dust settle'
relevant_findings.direct_quote: HAVE DECIDED TO LET THE DUST SETTLE ON THE RUSSIAN PROFESSORS FLAP BEFORE FOLLOWING UP PITCH
relevant_findings.significance: Indicates diplomatic or intelligence interactions involving Russian academics
